description: redevelopment to provide six blocks; two five storey one five storey and three four storey to accomodate 24 752 sq. m. of B1 floorspace with 1740 sq. m. of class A1 (shops) and A3 (food and drink) uses  together with 94 parking spaces in basement with access from Gaskin Street; pedestrian link between Gaskin Street and Islington Green  and extension to Collins Yard to provide service access between Gakin Street and Islington Green.
decision_conditions: The Greater London Development Plan and the Islington Development Plan provide that throughout their areas permission (temporary or permanent) will not, except in very special circumstances, be given for a change from residential use of any residential building, which can still be used with or without adaptation, for residential purposes of any kind and in this case it is considered that very special circumstances do not exist to justify a departure from that policy.
